page.title: 04CHURCH FARM,MILDENHALL
page.content: {Church Farm}is in Mildenhall and is a very large farm for this country.It is over 1100 acres in size and is a typical mixed farm.Its joint owner{Mr {J.Anslie,}rents the land from 3 different landlords.The farm is highly mechanised with 2 Combine Harvesters,1 bailer,2 seed drills,4 harrows,1 elevator,1 bail sledge,6 trailers,8 ploughs,9 tractors,1 spraying machine and a JCB.There are very few people working on such a large farm (18) because the machines do most of the work.They grow 2 main crops - high yielding wheat and barley as well as grass for silage.These crops are regularly sprayed with pesticides,insecticides and fungicides.They also keep 300 pigs and 260 dairy cattle in carefully regulated conditions,and they use a rotating milking carousel.
